resources.string: The Beni Mellal Polydisciplinary Faculty is a higher education institution of the Sultan Moulay Slimane University .Opened from the 2003-2004 academic year,it offers initial training and continuing education in various disciplinary fields: letters, human sciences, arts, computing, chemistry, physics, life and earth sciences, legal, social and economic sciences, languages ​​and communication…. The FPBM offers diversified training combining basic training and vocational training. Its purpose is to prepare and deliver the national diplomas of the Bachelor of Fundamental Studies (LEF), the Professional License (LP) and the Master.
Bienvenu !Vous êtes maintenant connecté au service de scolarité en ligne
